english_example_sentence: You are not living happily in this small family house.
russian_example_sentence: Вы не живете счастливо в этом маленьком семейном доме.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu küçük aile evinde mutlu yaşamıyorsunuz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bu küçük aile evinde mutlu ______.
